description: {"blocks":[{"key":"70r09","text":"This protocol demonstrates how to perform RNA isolation from AllProtect preserved or fresh snapfrozen human synovium and fat pad tissues.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"2a74c","text":"DISCLAIMER – FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY; USE AT YOUR OWN RISK","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lhvb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evrrg","text":"The protocol content here is for informational purposes only and does not constitute legal, medical, clinical, or safety advice, or otherwise; content added to protocols.io is not peer reviewed and may not have undergone a formal approval of any kind. Information presented in this protocol should not substitute for independent professional judgment, advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"69idn","text":"Liquid Nitrogen (LN)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egkf","text":"Ladle for Liquid Nitrogen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3rhh","text":"Wet Ice in Ice Bucket","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"201p1","text":"Dry Ice to keep samples frozen","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b58q2","text":"RNAse Away spray bottle to clean tools and workspace","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pvkp","text":"Clean Mortar and Pestle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s459","text":"Silicone Cover for Mortar and Pestle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3n3bm","text":"Small plastic scoop","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ab9nl","text":"Clean forceps to take out sample from tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2fg9","text":"Kim Wipes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54r7o","text":"Scalpel for tissue cutting","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pkpj","text":"Trizol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1cqkk","text":"Petri dish","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3enfg","text":"PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jq7u","text":"2.0mL microtubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jqi1","text":"Benchtop vortex","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qpkd","text":"Microtube rotator: 4℃ walk-in refrigerator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eksui","text":"Precooled 4℃ benchtop centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nrp5","text":"70% Ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4p4o1","text":"Chloroform","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1133","text":"100% Ethanol - to make complete RWT and RPE buffer IF NEEDED","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5l4gn","text":"Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Kit - columns,\ncollection tubes, 1.5mL microtubes, gDNA Eliminator, complete RWT buffer,\ncomplete RPE buffer, DNase free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33},{"style":"bold","offset":34,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working for downstream RNAseq analyses.

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cb0er","text":"Precool Benchtop Centrifuge and make sure temperature is at 4℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"50hh4","text":"Prepare tools, mortar and pestle, and work surface by spraying down with RNAse Away.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cusbv","text":"Prepare piece of tissue, weigh out 120-150mg of tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7aac4","text":"Add 3-4 ladles of liquid nitrogen to a clean mortar and pestle; allow to become cold.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9265h","text":"Once the mortar and pestle are cold, add the snapfrozen tissue to the mortar and add a small amount of liquid nitrogen. Once the liquid nitrogen evaporates, start smashing and grinding the tissue quickly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c4acc","text":"Add another ladle of liquid nitrogen to mortar and continue homogenizing the tissue. This is an ongoing process so keep adding liquid nitrogen until grinding creates a fine powder. Do not let the mortar and sample get warm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"csnhu","text":"Note - samples have a tendency to pop out of the mortar, having a silicone lid top on the mortar in the beginning helps keep tissue contained.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4pd3u","text":"Once you have the desired consistency of a fine powder, add half a ladle of liquid nitrogen and tilt mortar slightly on its side and begin scraping liquid nitrogen/powdered tissue suspension to the bottom for a more thorough collection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ej1as","text":"Just as the liquid nitrogen evaporates, use a pre-chilled scoop to transfer tissue powder right away to a chilled 2.0mL microtube with Trizol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cvdf1","text":"Use a benchtop vortex for 20 seconds max speed then place on ice for 1 minute.  Repeat 2 times for a total of 3 times so that no clumps remain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c758","text":"Place tube on Rotator at 4℃ and rotate for 20 minutes.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ateu","text":"After 20 minutes, spin for 30 seconds in precooled benchtop centrifuge at 12,000g at 4℃","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5jej2","text":"Transfer supernatant to pre-chilled 1.5mL microtube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9cmp","text":"You may continue OR stop here and immediately place sample into a -80℃ freezer for next day RNA extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e8t2d","text":"Precool Benchtop Centrifuge to 4℃ AND make sure you have another benchtop centrifuge at Room Temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8lt3d","text":"Gradually thaw samples on wet ice if previously frozen at -80℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fttq2","text":"To each trizol tube: Add 111uL gDNA Eliminator, vortex for 15 seconds. Add 220uL Chloroform, vortex for 30 seconds, and set out at Room Temperature for 3 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2s82v","text":"Spin at 12,000g for 15 minutes in 4℃ benchtop centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8avst","text":"Transfer top aqueous layer to a Room Temperature 2.0mL microtube.  Leave a generous layer behind and be careful to not disturb the middle and bottom layers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"adaij","text":"Add 1:1 70% Ethanol to the tube with top aqueous layer.  (For example-  600uL top layer and 600uL 70% Ethanol).  Mix well by pipetting up and down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4lfvd","text":"Allow the top aqueous layer/ethanol mixture to come to Room Temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3r28g","text":"Place 600uL into the Qiagen Column with the collection tube.  When loading column, be careful to not get the rim wet. Do not load in more than 700uL of mixture to the column at a time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"55oc4","text":"Spin at 12,000 rpm in Room Temperature benchtop centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b0a85","text":"Discard flow through after spin, invert collection tube and dab tube on paper towel to remove excess liquid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"11puu","text":"Repeat steps 22, 23, and 24 until all of the mixture has gone through the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e2rai","text":"Place tubes in rack and open tops for 2 minutes to allow columns to air dry and remaining ethanol to evaporate. This improves 260/230 ratio.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a3abp","text":"Add 700uL of RWT buffer to each column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"g9pr","text":"Spin for 15 seconds at 12,000 rpm in Room Temperature centrifuge.  Discard flow through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"37bo8","text":"Add 500uL of RPE buffer to each column, incubate at Room Temperature for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aetde","text":"Spin for 15 seconds at 12,000 rpm in Room Temperature centrifuge.  Discard flow through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ah1nm","text":"Repeat steps 15 and 16 for two additional times, for a total of 3 RPE washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7kl5p","text":"Spin for 2 minutes at 12,000 rpm in Room Temperature centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cn1hq","text":"Place column in new collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4p7a2","text":"Spin-dry for 3 minutes at 12,000 rpm Room Temperature centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c8vif","text":"Place column in new 1.5mL Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3r4pa","text":"Add 30uL water to column to elute RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a2csl","text":"Spin for 1 minute at 12,000 rpm in Room Temperature centrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"55h44","text":"Place eluate back into column and spin once more for 1 minute at 12,000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Qiagen RNeasy Plus Universal Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9kbg1","text":"Check RNA concentration using Nanodrop. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"83mnv","text":"Add 1 mL Trizol to Eppendorf tubes and place tubes on ice.  For each Trizol-filled microtube, place another empty 2.0mL tube on ice. \n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"amqr6","text":"AllProtect tissue: Thaw AllProtect samples at Room Temperature. Wash well in PBS in a petri dish, place onto kimwipe to remove liquid. Then weigh your tissue 120-150mg. Mince the tissue in a petri dish, then place in a 1.5mL tube and freeze in liquid nitrogen. This helps with the tissue homogenization steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4qif7","text":"Snapfrozen tissue: If you have to cut a smaller piece of snapfrozen tissue to fit weight range, do so in a petri dish placed on a piece of dry ice so sample remains frozen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"27h5e","text":"Perform the tissue grinding steps as quickly as possible to avoid any RNA degradation and tissue thawing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: RNA Isolation of Human Synovium and Fat Pad Tissues
title_html: RNA Isolation of Human Synovium and Fat Pad Tissues

versions.title: RNA Isolation of Human Synovium and Fat Pad Tissues
versions.title_html: RNA Isolation of Human Synovium and Fat Pad Tissues
